CGSL-1.A.C.3|warning|Signal names, variable names, type names, label names and function names should be between 2 and 40 characters in length.

CGSL-1.A.D.1|message|Package file name should be followed by "pac.vhd".
	Message||Industry rules require the package file name postfix to be '_pac'. Overriding user setting '_pkg'.|

CGSL-1.A.E.2|message|Clock, Reset, and Enable signals should follow recommended naming convention.
	Message||Industry rules require the reset signal name to contain 'rst_x' or 'reset_x' or 'rstx' or 'resetx'. Overriding user setting 'reset'.|

CGSL-2.A.F.2|warning|LSB of one-dimensional arrays should be zero.
	Warning|component|Vector types present in the model; LSB of vectors will not be zero in the generated code.|

CGSL-2.J.F.5|error|Large multipliers of 16 bits or larger, must not be described using the multiplication operator with RTL.
	Error|multiplier|Industry multiplier  'count_scaler' has result size of 16-bits or larger|hdl_modulator/count_scaler
	Error|multiplier|Industry multiplier  'imag_signal_modulator' has result size of 16-bits or larger|hdl_modulator/imag_signal_modulator
	Error|multiplier|Industry multiplier  'real_signal_modulator' has result size of 16-bits or larger|hdl_modulator/real_signal_modulator

CGSL-2.C.C.6|message|Asynchronous reset signals were requested. Select 'synchronous' reset to conform to the selected standard.
	Message||HDL configuration parameter 'ResetType' is set to 'asynchronous'; the coding standard customization rule requires setting it to 'synchronous'.|
